Augmatrix is designed using simple yet extreme structural systems in order to streamline theoretical approaches to defined modes of augmentation as a method for expressing sensory boundary.
A series of small houses and ADUs designed for a co-ownership property in Joshua Tree. Work conducted at JBohn Associates.
A collection of projects designed with an emphasis on structural expression. Moholy Nagy XI (2nd photo) also served as formal expression inspiration for the first project in this list.

These Claremont bus shelters blend infrastructure and public art, optimizing shade, airflow, solar alignment, and site-specific constraints with unique perforation patterns. Work conducted at JBohn Associates.
